gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਬਿਬਿਧ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਰ ਕਰਤ ਸਿੰਗਾਰ ਨਾਰਿ ਭੇਟਤ ਭਤਾਰ ੳੁਰ ਹਾਰ ਨ ਸੁਹਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Bibidh Prakaar Karat Singaar Naari , Bhaytat Bhataar Ur Haar N Suhaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a wife makes over many type of embellishments in order to attract her husband, but once in the embrace of her husband, she does not like even the necklace in her neck.

gurmukhi: ਬਾਲਕ ਅਚੇਤ ਜੈਸੇ ਕਰਤ ਅਨੇਕ ਲੀਲਾ ਸੁਰਤ ਸਮਾਰ ਬਾਲ ਬੁਧਿ ਬਿਸਰਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Baalak Achayt Jaisay Karat Anayk Leelaa , Surat Samaar Baal Budhi Bisaraat Hai ?
translation: Just as an innocent child plays many types of games as a child, but as soon as he grows up, he forgets all his childhood preoccupations.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਪ੍ਰਿਯਾ ਸੰਗਮ ਸੁਜਸ ਨਾਯਕਾ ਬਖਾਨੈ ਸੁਨ ਸੁਨ ਸਜਨੀ ਸਕਲ ਬਿਗਸਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Priyaa Sangam Sujas Naayakaa Bakhaanai , Soun Soun Sajanee Sakal Bigasaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a wife praises before her friends the meeting that she had with her husband and her friends feel happy listening to her details.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਖਟ ਕਰਮ ਧਰਮ ਸ੍ਰਮ ਗਯਾਨ ਕਾਜ ਗਯਾਨ ਭਾਨੁ ੳੁਦੈ ੳੁਡਿ ਕਰਮ ੳੁਡਾਤ ਹੈ ॥੬੦੪॥
transliteration: Taisay Khat Karam Dharam Sram Gayaan Kaaja , Gayaan Bhaanu Udai Udi Karam Udaat Hai ?604?
translation: Similarly, the six righteous deeds performed so laboriously for acquisition of knowledge, all of them disappear with the radiance of Guru's teachings and Naam like the stars disappear with the brightness of the Sun. (All these so-called righteous deeds ar
